entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Sarre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
